item.title: Some Golden Thoughts Of Thiruvalluvar
item.description: Tirukkural by Tiruvalluvar (A Tamil - poet/writer) was written more than 5000 yrs ago. It’s one of the ancient science on Human behavior, which has not changed dispite of modern education & technology If your child lies to you often, it is because you over-react too harshly to their inappropriate behavior. If your child is not taught to confide in you about their mistakes, you’ve lost them.
